body:
Hello everyone, I was just wondering if any of you are good at making YouTube channel icons!

I've had my icon for quite a while now, so I was thinking of replacing it.
It looks like this right now: https://www.youtube.com/user/mlgporky

What I would like it to look like:
  • Animated face (my skin).
  • My name "MLGPorky" (if it looks better without the name, you can leave it out).
  • Background colour optional.
Those are the basics of what I would like my icon to look like. If any of you are good at creating icons, your help would be appreciated, and I will give your channel a shoutout (if you do not have a YouTube channel, I will still mention your Minecraft IGN if you wish).

Good luck everyone! ^o^
body_tagged:

title: Need Help With New Channel Icon + Shoutout!
